policies.name: SuperAdmin Policy
policies.description: Chính sách quản trị viên hệ thống

policies.name: Any role
policies.description: Sau khi login mới truy cập được

policies.name: Administration Permission
policies.description: Chỉ có role Admin với Supper Admin mới truy cập được

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: basic
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add all basic claims to the token

kc.user.profile.config: {"attributes":[{"name":"username","displayName":"${username}","validations":{"length":{"min":3,"max":255},"username-prohibited-characters":{},"up-username-not-idn-homograph":{}},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false},{"name":"email","displayName":"${email}","validations":{"email":{},"length":{"max":255}},"required":{"roles":["user"]},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false},{"name":"firstName","displayName":"${firstName}","validations":{"length":{"max":255},"person-name-prohibited-characters":{}},"required":{"roles":["user"]},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false},{"name":"lastName","displayName":"${lastName}","validations":{"length":{"max":255},"person-name-prohibited-characters":{}},"required":{"roles":["user"]},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false},{"name":"phoneNumber","displayName":"${phoneNumber}","validations":{"pattern":{"pattern":"(84|0[3|5|7|8|9])+([0-9]{8})\\b","error-message":"Số điện thoại không đúng định dạng"}},"annotations":{},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false},{"name":"address","displayName":"${address}","validations":{"length":{"min":"2","max":"100"}},"annotations":{},"permissions":{"view":["admin","user"],"edit":["admin","user"]},"multivalued":false}],"groups":[{"name":"user-metadata","displayHeader":"User metadata","displayDescription":"Attributes, which refer to user metadata"}]}
